name: Get Positions Test
description: Test case for retrieving current positions through agent interaction

parts.text: What positions do I currently hold?

OK. Here is a summary of your current positions in account UITESTER01:

You have 9 positions:
*   100 shares of SPY
*   50 shares of AAPL
*   25 shares of MSFT
*   30 shares of TSLA
*   15 shares of GOOGL
*   1 MSFT put option (MSFT250117P00300000)
*   3 GOOGL call options (GOOGL250214C00130000)
*   2 AAPL call options (AAPL250221C00180000)
*   Short 1 SPY call option (SPY250321C00420000)

The total market value of your portfolio is $*, with a total cost basis of $* and unrealized profit/loss of $*.

This is a paper trading account, so all transactions are simulated and do not involve real money.
